data.comment: The match is underway at Groupama Stadium.
In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Lyon.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Lyon.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
In the minute 5, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 7, Lyon are pushing forward but Memphis Depay's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Lyon are caught offside.
In the minute 9, Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi gets in a shot on goal at Groupama Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Lyon are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal! Memphis Depay gives Lyon a 1-0 lead in Lyon.
In the minute 12, Great play from Houssem Aouar to set up the goal.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Monaco have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Throw-in for Monaco at Groupama Stadium.
Youssouf Fofana gets his shot on target but fails to score for Monaco.
In the minute 19, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Lyon's Houssem Aouar misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Monaco at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 20, Free kick Monaco.
Tino Kadewere (Lyon) gets a yellow card.
Jerome Brisard signals a throw-in for Monaco, close to Lyon's area.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Jerome Brisard awards Lyon a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Goal! Lyon extend their lead to 2-0 through Karl Toko Ekambi.
Tino Kadewere instrumental with a fine assist.
Lyon push forward at Groupama Stadium and Memphis Depay gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Monaco defence.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Monaco close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Lyon needs to be cautious. Monaco have an attacking throw-in.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 40, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Lyon.
Monaco's Djibril Sidibe has been booked in Lyon.
Lyon have extended their lead to 3-0 courtesy of a Houssem Aouar penalty.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
In the minute 43, Can Lyon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monaco's half?
Jerome Brisard signals a Lyon throw-in in Monaco's half.
Goal! Karl Toko Ekambi extends Lyon's lead to 4-0.
In the minute 45, Jerome Brisard awards the home team a throw-in.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Lyon.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Niko Kovac (Monaco) is making a first substitution, with Caio Henrique replacing Djibril Sidibe.
Monaco make their second substitution with Cesc Fabregas replacing Florentino Luis.
In the minute 46, Chrislain Matsima is replacing Stevan Jovetic for the away team.
Monaco have been awarded a penalty...
Wissam Ben Yedder pulls one back for Monaco from the penalty spot.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Lyon.
Chrislain Matsima (Monaco) has received a yellow card from Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 53, Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
In the minute 55, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Groupama Stadium, Ruben Aguilar has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Jerome Brisard signals a Monaco throw-in in Lyon's half.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Monaco.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Maxence Caqueret is replacing Houssem Aouar for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 58, Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Lyon to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 64, Jerome Brisard awards Lyon a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Lucas Paqueta with Moussa Dembele. This is the second substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
Lyon are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Monaco.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
In the minute 68, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Monaco have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Sinaly Diomande for Lyon has been booked by Jerome Brisard and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Free kick Monaco.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lyon.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Jerome Brisard signals a Lyon throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 76, Wissam Ben Yedder of Monaco gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Monaco have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Lyon.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Gelson Martins with Kevin Volland.
Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rudi Garcia is making the team's third substitution at Groupama Stadium with Bruno Guimaraes replacing Tino Kadewere.
Lyon pushes forward through Moussa Dembele, whose finish on goal is saved.
The home team have replaced Leo Dubois with Mattia De Sciglio. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
In the minute 81, Melvin Michel Maxence Bard is replacing Maxwel Cornet for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Lyon.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Monaco.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Monaco just outside Lyon's area.
In the minute 83, Thiago Mendes (Lyon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Monaco's Wissam Ben Yedder gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lyon defender.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 87, In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Moussa Dembele for Lyon is whistled offside.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Monaco in the half of Lyon.
Melvin Michel Maxence Bard Lyon.
At Groupama Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Throw-in Monaco.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jerome Brisard blows to end the match. The final score is 4-1.
